fieldName: Global Header
Enable LunaLib setting
fieldDescription: Will use the setting in SYSTEM_MARKER_OPTIONS.ini if false.

fieldName: Show markers when interface is hidden
Rotate with Flux Reticle
fieldDescription:
Only active when you using 'Flux Reticle'ã€‚
Let markers around cursor rotate with the 'Flux Reticle' replaced one.

fieldName: Rotatethe top of rings
fieldDescription:
Only active when you using 'Flux Reticle', and 'Rotate with Flux Reticle,Boolean' is true.
Let the top of the markers' ring rotate with the cursor.

fieldName: Ship System Marker Header
Enable Ship System Marker
fieldDescription:
Ship System Marker shows the remaining of your ship's system, and cooling down with a ring.
Displayed at the top left of the cursor.

fieldName: Thickness of Ship System Marker's ring
Radius of Ship System Marker's ring
Horizontal shift of Ship System Marker's ring
Vertical shift of Ship System Marker's ring
Alpha of Ship System Marker's main ring
Alpha of Ship System Marker's back ring
Font size of the ships system's remaining
Horizontal shift of the ships system's remaining
Horizontal shift of the ships system's remaining
Special System Marker Header
enable Special System Marker
fieldDescription:
Contains Shield marker.
Shows the remaining of your ship's special defence system, and cool down with a ring, if she has one.
Shows the shield states including max arc, current facing, if she has one.
Displayed at the bottom left of the cursor.

fieldName: Thickness of Special System Marker's ring
Radius of Special System Marker's ring
Horizontal shift of Special System Marker's ring
Vertical shift of Special System Marker's ring
Alpha of Special System Marker's main ring
Alpha of Special System Marker's back ring
Font size of the Special system's remaining
Horizontal shift of the Special system's remaining
Vertical shift of the Special system's remaining
Ammo Remaining Marker Header
Enable Ammo Remaining Marker
fieldDescription:
Shows weapons' ammo remaining of the ally ship which you locked on.
The marker will fade after several seconds.

fieldName: Ammo Remaining Marker rotate with ship
Font size of Ammo Remaining Marker
Displaying Time of Ammo Remaining Marker
Fading Time of Ammo Remaining Marker
Weapon repair Marker Header
Enable Weapon repair Marker
fieldDescription: Shows offlined weapons' repair progress of your ship and the ally ship which you locked on.

fieldName: Weapon repair Marker's size of small slot weapons
Weapon repair Marker's size of medium slot weapons
Weapon repair Marker's size of large slot weapons
Alpha of Weapon repair Marker
Engine Repair Marker Header
Enable Engine Repair Marker
fieldDescription: Shows offlined engines' repair progress of your ship and the ally ship which you locked on.

fieldName: Size multiplier of Engine Repair Marker
Alpha of Engine repair Marker
Torpedo Marker Header
Enable Torpedo Marker
fieldDescription: Shows unguided torpedos which may hit your ship in several seconds.

fieldName: Torpedo Marker's mode
fieldDescription:
Toggle the caculating mode to balance between accuracy and performance
 - bound
Caculate through the bound of your ship. High accuracy, low performance.
 - rangeRough
Caculate through the collision radius of your ship. Low accuracy, High performance.

fieldName: Thickness of Torpedo Marker
Size multiplier of Torpedo Marker
Alpha of Torpedo Marker
Torpedo Marker counts Missile
fieldDescription:
Toggle true to let Torpedo Marker count guided Missile.
Missiles which are facing with your ship and close enough will be counted.

fieldName: Torpedo Marker missile within angle
fieldDescription:
if the angle between the missile and your ship is less than this value,
the missile will be counted, if it is close enough too.

fieldName: Mine Marker Header
Enable Mine Marker
fieldDescription: Shows mines arounds your ship which may cause damage.

fieldName: Size multiplier of Mine Marker
Alpha of Mine Marker
Range multiplier of Mine Marker to blink
Torpedo Alarm Header
Enable Torpedo Alarm
fieldDescription:
Only works when at least one is enable between Torpedo Marker and Mine Marker.
Plays three levels of alarms based on the total damage of torpedos and mines which Torpedo Marker and Mine Marker counted.

fieldName: Audio volume of Torpedo Alarm
Threshold of Torpedo Alarm Lv1
Threshold of Torpedo Alarm Lv2
Threshold of Torpedo Alarm Lv3
